analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/28/0x7005be353665346bc7586ec77fc8edfb60c9d00b.sol:
	Contract TourCash has payable functions:
	 - approveAndCall (/unique_chucks/28/0x7005be353665346bc7586ec77fc8edfb60c9d00b.sol#348-357)
	 - transferAndCall (/unique_chucks/28/0x7005be353665346bc7586ec77fc8edfb60c9d00b.sol#380-386)
	 - transferFromAndCall (/unique_chucks/28/0x7005be353665346bc7586ec77fc8edfb60c9d00b.sol#408-414)
	 - increaseApprovalAndCall (/unique_chucks/28/0x7005be353665346bc7586ec77fc8edfb60c9d00b.sol#440-448)
	 - decreaseApprovalAndCall (/unique_chucks/28/0x7005be353665346bc7586ec77fc8edfb60c9d00b.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
